abstract: Chen Guangcheng, whose nighttime escape and conflict with the Chinese government led to a diplomatic crisis for the United States last spring, is writing a memoir to be published next year.
snippet: Chen Guangcheng, whose nighttime escape and conflict with the Chinese government led to a diplomatic crisis for the United States last spring, is writing a memoir to be published next year.
lead_paragraph: Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese lawyer and rights activist whose conflict with the Chinese government last spring riveted the world and started a diplomatic crisis for the United States, has landed a book deal to write about his life, his publisher said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Blind Chinese Rights Activist Is Writing a Memoir
